elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: Why do you want to change employer?
elements.correctAnswer: I have been working at Trisa AG in Lucerne since I started my apprenticeship, where I am part of a very friendly team. Thanks to good supervision and guidance, I was able to gain a lot of valuable experience there, particularly in the maintenance of production systems. After four years, I am now looking for a new challenge where I can contribute my experience. I would also like to develop professionally.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What are you particularly interested in here?
elements.correctAnswer: The idea of independently carrying out maintenance and servicing work on a wide variety of devices and machines excites me. The production of new machine and system parts has not been one of my core tasks so far. I would like to learn more in this area. Until a year ago, I hosted a successful YouTube channel with 15,000 subscribers, where I published tutorials for simple car repair work. However, I had to give up this hobby due to time constraints. I would like to incorporate the strategies and skills I was able to acquire into my new job. I am very familiar with the fields of pneumatics and hydraulics; they formed the basis for my core tasks at Trisa AG.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: How would your colleague describe you?
elements.correctAnswer: I am an outgoing, communicative and flexible person who enjoys taking on challenges. I attach great importance to accuracy at work, because a good quality result is important to me and gives me pleasure. I organize myself independently and efficiently and like to give my all.
